text: Three Cups of Tea is a book co-written by Greg Mortenson and David Oliver Relin."Paperback Nonfiction Bestsellers", The New York Times, March 16, 2008. It follows Mr. Mortenson's journey to founding his organisation, the Central Asia Institute (CAI), which builds schools and other facilities for children, especially girls, in Pakistan and Afghanistan."Mortenson Campaigned to Build Schools in Asia", ABC News, March 8, 2006. ==References== Category:American autobiographies Category:2007 books
title: Three Cups of Tea
